faqs.answer: Yes absolutely Sector 31 is considered a very high-footfall area. It is surrounded by dense established residential sectors and corporate offices nearby. faqs.question: What is the typical rental yield I can expect from a commercial shop here
faqs.answer: Typical gross rental yields for prime commercial property in Sector 31 range between 5% and 8% per annum depending on the exact location tenant profile and lease terms. Retail spaces generally offer slightly higher yields than office spaces in this area especially if the tenant is a strong national or international brand with a long lock-in period. faqs.question: Are there any specific legal compliances needed when buying commercial property in Gurugram
faqs.answer: Yes commercial property transactions require rigorous due diligence. You must verify the property’s title deed check for encumbrances ensure all municipal taxes are cleared and confirm the property has the necessary commercial zoning and occupation certificates OC. We ensure every Shop For Sale in Sector 31 listed through us has complete legal clarity to protect your investment from future disputes.

faqs.question: Can foreign investors purchase a Shop For Sale in Sector 31
faqs.answer: Yes foreign nationals or entities can purchase commercial property in India subject to compliance with the Foreign Exchange Management Act FEMA regulations. We recommend consulting a legal expert specializing in FEMA before proceeding with the purchase.
